memories.content: Waves 1-10 property/deal/document CRUD (2026-01-14). Market Data Pipeline: DB dashboard_market_data with 253K records (2026-02-05). ReportSettings + property transforms refactor + Zod validation (2026-02-07). Sales Analysis Dashboard: 10 endpoints, 6 visualizations, filter panel, 205 tests (2026-02-10). DealStage enum fix + deprecation cleanup (2026-02-10). Extraction Pipeline Review: 16 issues fixed (2026-02-11). Construction Pipeline COMPLETE: 5 DB tables, CoStar import, 6 API clients (Census BPS, FRED, BLS, Mesa SODA, Tempe BLDS, Gilbert ArcGIS), scheduler, 12+3 endpoints, Leaflet map, 4 tabs (2026-02-11). UW Model Grouping Phases 1-2: 342 candidates → 30 active groups (244 files), 9 Proforma deferred, 2 Asset Mgmt excluded. Dashboard Multi-Page Fixes (2026-02-11): Pipeline Map /all endpoint (fixed 422 page_size bug), delivery date backfill via compute_delivery_date(), CONSTRUCTION_API_ENABLED=true + /fetch-all trigger, interest rates mock removal (deleted mockInterestRates.ts, removed 4 mock methods), USA Market subpage (/market/usa with national FRED series). Tests: 1522 backend + 521 frontend, zero TS errors.

conda env: dashboard-backend. Backend port 8000, Frontend port 5173. Git: stash apply over pop, don't push unless asked. User prefers validation/testing before new features. No agent swarms for sequential dependent tasks. Be extremely clear about required user actions. User prefers directness over hedging. NO mock data, NO fake data, NO silent fallbacks — show errors instead. Commit strategy: split by logical area, push when asked. Obsidian vault: 'Programming Vault' at /mnt/c/Users/MattBorgeson/Documents/Programming Vault/Dashboard Interface. User demands thorough validation — test ALL files, not just samples. Don't overclaim confidence without evidence. User open to parallel agent teams for independent work streams.

pydantic-settings 2.x: CORS_ORIGINS must be JSON array. Single .env in project root, symlinked from backend/.env. Main DB: PostgreSQL localhost:5432/dashboard_interface_data. VITE_API_URL: src/lib/config.ts appends /api/v1. DealStage enum: 6-stage. Alembic requires PYTHONPATH=. from backend dir. Zod 4.3.6: .transform() replaces manual transforms. SQLite in tests: no server_default, DateTime(timezone=True), datetime.now(UTC). StrEnum + SQLAlchemy: dealstage lowercase → values_callable. Lazy imports: patch at source module. ThreadPoolExecutor for CPU-bound Excel, sequential DB ops. React Compiler: no setState in useEffect, no ref.current in render. Alembic head: 6f4865487bb2 (widen fema_flood_zone). Prefer stdlib over third-party (e.g., date arithmetic over dateutil.relativedelta) to avoid CI mypy stubs issues.

SHAREPOINT EXTRACTION: Production pipeline: FILE_PATTERN=.*UW.*Model.*vCurrent.*, CUTOFF_DATE=2024-07-15, excludes Speedboat/vOld. 28/28 files, 26 properties. Cell reference: Underwriting_Dashboard_Cell_References.xlsx (1,169 fields across 6 sheets). UW GROUPING PIPELINE: CandidateFileFilter — must contain 'vCurrent.xlsb' + one of (Model/UW/Proforma) + modified before 2024-07-15 + .xlsb only. Excludes: [Deal Name], Settlement Statement, Due Diligence Tracker, AutoRecovered, Speedboat, vOld, Tax, Cashflows, Development, Portfolio, Template, ~$. SharePoint deal stages: 0) Dead, 1) Initial UW, 2) Active UW, 3) Under Contract, 4) Closed, 5) Realized. UW files on native WSL2: /home/mattb/projects/dashboard_interface_project/backend/data/uw_model_files/. CELL VALIDATION: 244/244 files tested, 99.7% canary accuracy, 69% fields present, 31% template-version gaps (empty=gap not shift). 6 of 30 groups have True Shift issues (row insertion/deletion causing address misalignment) — need per-group mapping files. Reconciliation approach: diff shifted group fingerprints against production reference to generate group-specific cell address overrides. Proforma groups deferred.

1) UW Model Extraction Phase 3-4: Generate per-group mapping files for 6 shifted groups, then run extraction. Proforma groups deferred. 2) Docker Compose production config. 3) Production hosting — Oracle Cloud Free Tier or Hetzner CX22 with Tailscale. 4) Mobile-friendly iOS version (post-deployment). Domain context: Cabana on 99th + Tempe Metro = currently owned (Closed=owned, Realized=sold).
